briefdescription.para: Create a value type from @data with size @bytes and typeid @id.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to memory block
Size in bytes of the memory block @data
Type of memory block @data

simplesect.para: Pointer to value if success, null otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Make a deep copy of value @v.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value is going to be copied

simplesect.para: Pointer to a deep copy of new value if success, null otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of the value type.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value

simplesect.para: Size in bytes of the value type

briefdescription.para: Returns the amount of values this value contains.

simplesect.para: Number of values @v represents
